an8.8:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma uttaro mahisavatthusmim viharati sankheyyake pabbate vatajalikayam.
an8.8:1.2: Tatra kho ayasma uttaro bhikkhu amantesi:
an8.8:1.3: “sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam attavipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:1.4: Sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam paravipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:1.5: Sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam attasampattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:1.6: Sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam parasampattim paccavekkhita hoti”ti.
an8.8:2.1: Tena kho pana samayena vessavano maharaja uttaraya disaya dakkhinam disam gacchati kenacideva karaniyena.
an8.8:2.2: Assosi kho vessavano maharaja ayasmato uttarassa mahisavatthusmim sankheyyake pabbate vatajalikayam bhikkhunam evam dhammam desentassa:
an8.8:2.3: “sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam attavipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:2.4: Sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam paravipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:2.5: Sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam attasampattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:2.6: Sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam parasampattim paccavekkhita hoti”ti.
an8.8:3.1: Atha kho vessavano maharaja—seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam mahisavatthusmim sankheyyake pabbate vatajalikayam antarahito devesu tavatimsesu paturahosi.
an8.8:3.2: Atha kho vessavano maharaja yena sakko devanamindo tenupasankami; upasankamitva sakkam devanamindam etadavoca:
an8.8:3.4: Eso ayasma uttaro mahisavatthusmim sankheyyake pabbate vatajalikayam bhikkhunam evam dhammam deseti:
an8.8:3.5: ‘sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam attavipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:4.1: Atha kho sakko devanamindo seyyathapi nama balava puriso saminjitam va baham pasareyya, pasaritam va baham saminjeyya; evamevam devesu tavatimsesu antarahito mahisavatthusmim sankheyyake pabbate vatajalikayam ayasmato uttarassa sammukhe paturahosi.
an8.8:4.2: Atha kho sakko devanamindo yenayasma uttaro tenupasankami; upasankamitva ayasmantam uttaram abhivadetva ekamantam atthasi. Ekamantam thito kho sakko devanamindo ayasmantam uttaram etadavoca:
an8.8:5.1: “Saccam kira, bhante, ayasma uttaro bhikkhunam evam dhammam desesi:
an8.8:5.2: ‘sadhavuso, bhikkhu kalena kalam attavipattim paccavekkhita hoti,
an8.8:5.7: “Kim panidam, bhante, ayasmato uttarassa sakam patibhanam, udahu tassa bhagavato vacanam arahato sammasambuddhassa”ti?
an8.8:5.9: Upamaya m’idhekacce vinnu purisa bhasitassa attham ajananti.
an8.8:6.1: Seyyathapi, devanaminda, gamassa va nigamassa va avidure mahadhannarasi.
an8.8:6.4: Yo nu kho, devanaminda, tam mahajanakayam upasankamitva evam puccheyya:
an8.8:6.5: ‘kuto imam dhannam aharatha’ti, katham byakaramano nu kho, devanaminda, so mahajanakayo samma byakaramano byakareyya”ti?
an8.8:6.6: “‘Amumha mahadhannarasimha aharama’ti kho, bhante, so mahajanakayo samma byakaramano byakareyya”ti.
an8.8:6.7: “Evamevam kho, devanaminda, yam kinci subhasitam sabbam tam tassa bhagavato vacanam arahato sammasambuddhassa.
an8.8:6.8: Tato upadayupadaya mayam canne ca bhanama”ti.
an8.8:7.3: ‘yam kinci subhasitam sabbam tam tassa bhagavato vacanam arahato sammasambuddhassa.
an8.8:7.5: Ekamidam, bhante uttara, samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati gijjhakute pabbate acirapakkante devadatte.
an8.8:7.6: Tatra kho bhagava devadattam arabbha bhikkhu amantesi:
an8.8:8.1: ‘Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam attavipattim paccavekkhita hoti.
an8.8:8.2: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalena kalam paravipattim …pe…
an8.8:8.5: Atthahi, bhikkhave, asaddhammehi abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho.
an8.8:8.7: Labhena hi, bhikkhave, abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho;
an8.8:8.14: papamittataya, bhikkhave, abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho.
an8.8:8.15: Imehi kho, bhikkhave, atthahi asaddhammehi abhibhuto pariyadinnacitto devadatto apayiko nerayiko kappattho atekiccho.
an8.8:9.1: Sadhu, bhikkhave, bhikkhu uppannam labham abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:10.1: Kinca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca uppannam labham abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:11.1: Yam hissa, bhikkhave, uppannam labham anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyum asava vighataparilaha, uppannam labham abhibhuyya viharato evamsa te asava vighataparilaha na honti.
an8.8:11.8: uppannam papamittatam anabhibhuyya viharato uppajjeyyum asava vighataparilaha, uppannam papamittatam abhibhuyya viharato evamsa te asava vighataparilaha na honti.
an8.8:11.9: Idam kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu atthavasam paticca uppannam labham abhibhuyya abhibhuyya vihareyya;
an8.8:13.1: Ettavata, bhante uttara, manussesu catasso parisa—
an8.8:13.4: Ugganhatu, bhante, ayasma uttaro imam dhammapariyayam.
an8.8:13.5: Pariyapunatu, bhante, ayasma uttaro imam dhammapariyayam.
an8.8:13.6: Dharetu, bhante, ayasma uttaro imam dhammapariyayam.
